posts.text: 不差分前缀和70，部分分也太多了8 差分 模拟 每个三角形的每一行的首尾打上差分标记 时间复杂度1e8 代码： 12345678910111213141516171819202122232425262728293031323334353637383940414243444546474849505152535455565758596061626364656667686970#include<cstdio>#include<algorithm>#include<cstring>using namespace std;namespace io{ #define re register #define ll long long #define inf 0x3f3f3f3f #define il inline #define in1(a) read(a) #define in2(a,b) in1(a),in1(b) #define in3(a,b,c) in2(a,b),in1(c) #define in4(a,b,c,d) in2(a,b),in2(c,d) il void readl(ll &x){ x=0;ll f=1;char c=getchar(); while(c<'0'||c>'9'){if(c=='-')f=-f;c=getchar();} while(c>='0'&&c<='9'){x=x*10+c-'0';c=getchar();} x*=f; } il void read(int &x){ x=0;int f=1;char c=getchar(); while(c<'0'||c>'9'){if(c=='-')f=-f;c=getchar();} while(c>='0'&&c<='9'){x=x*10+c-'0';c=getchar();} x*=f; }}using namespace io;#define N 1005int n;ll map[N][N];int main(){ int opt,x,y,l,c; read(n); while(n--){ read(opt); in4(x,y,l,c); if(opt==1){ for(re int i=0;i<=l;i++){ map[x+i][y]+=c; map[x+i][y+l+1-i]-=c; } } else if(opt==2){ for(re int i=0;i<=l;i++){ map[x+i][y-l+i]+=c; map[x+i][y+1]-=c; } } else if(opt==3){ for(re int i=0;i<=l;i++){ map[x-i][y]+=c; map[x-i][y+l+1-i]-=c; } } else{ for(re int i=0;i<=l;i++){ map[x-i][y-l+i]+=c; map[x-i][y+1]-=c; } } } ll ans=-1e17; for(re int i=1;i<=1000;i++){ for(re int j=1;j<=1000;j++){ map[i][j]+=map[i][j-1]; ans=max(ans,map[i][j]); } } printf("%lld",ans); return 0;}

posts.text: 反正我输出无解24分 贪心 判断是否可行：任意两点（已知的点）曼哈顿距离*d >= 两点价值之差的绝对值 丢进小根堆，价值小的先 每次取堆顶，四向扩展，标记，可保证正确性 代码： 12345678910111213141516171819202122232425262728293031323334353637383940414243444546474849505152535455565758596061626364656667686970717273747576#include<cstdio>#include<algorithm>#include<cstring>#include<queue>using namespace std;namespace io{ #define re register #define ll long long #define inf 0x3f3f3f3f #define il inline #define in1(a) read(a) #define in2(a,b) in1(a),in1(b) #define in3(a,b,c) in2(a,b),in1(c) #define in4(a,b,c,d) in2(a,b),in2(c,d) il void readl(ll &x){ x=0;ll f=1;char c=getchar(); while(c<'0'||c>'9'){if(c=='-')f=-f;c=getchar();} while(c>='0'&&c<='9'){x=x*10+c-'0';c=getchar();} x*=f; } il void read(int &x){ x=0;int f=1;char c=getchar(); while(c<'0'||c>'9'){if(c=='-')f=-f;c=getchar();} while(c>='0'&&c<='9'){x=x*10+c-'0';c=getchar();} x*=f; }}using namespace io;#define N 2005int h,w,n,d;const int dir[4][2]={{1,0},{0,1},{-1,0},{0,-1}};const int mod=1e9+7;struct node{ int x,y,c; bool operator <(const node &rhs) const{ return c>rhs.c; }}a[N];int dis(int i,int j){ return abs(a[i].x-a[j].x)+abs(a[i].y-a[j].y);} ll map[N][N];bool vis[N][N];priority_queue <node> q;int main(){ in4(h,w,n,d); for(re int i=1;i<=n;i++) in3(a[i].x,a[i].y,a[i].c); for(re int i=1;i<=n;i++){ for(re int j=i+1;j<=n;j++){ if(dis(i,j)*d<abs(a[i].c-a[j].c)){ puts("PitayaCrying"); return 0; } } } for(re int i=1;i<=n;i++) q.push(a[i]); while(!q.empty()){ node now=q.top(); q.pop(); if(vis[now.x][now.y]) continue; vis[now.x][now.y]=1; map[now.x][now.y]=now.c; for(re int i=0;i<4;i++){ int nx=now.x+dir[i][0],ny=now.y+dir[i][1]; if(nx<1||nx>h||ny<1||ny>w||vis[nx][ny]) continue; q.push((node){nx,ny,now.c+d}); } } ll ans=0; for(re int i=1;i<=h;i++){ for(re int j=1;j<=w;j++){ ans=(ans+map[i][j])%mod; } } printf("%lld",ans); return 0;}
